definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Then she ran to the pay-phone to call the polices.
sentences.chinese: 她立刻跑到投币电话亭，打电话报警。

sentences.english: Over 20 metres or so, there's a telephone-box there.
sentences.chinese: 再走二十几米，那里有一个电话亭。

sentences.english: Soon, before a pothead dies at booth.
sentences.chinese: 不久之后，一名瘾君子死于电话亭前。

sentences.english: Avoid using an enclosed phone box in the street, as the prowler could trap you inside.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用街上封闭式的电话亭。

sentences.english: Have tickle fights, go to a comedy club, make-out in a photo booth.
sentences.chinese: 追着挠痒痒，去看喜剧演出，到电话亭打个调情电话。

sentences.english: There happened to be a telephone booth near the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 正巧有一个电话亭在公共汽车站附近。

sentences.english: There is a public telephone station at the roadside.
I'm in a phone box outside No. 96, Cranston Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 我在克伦斯顿大道96号外面的电话亭里。

sentences.english: I have to make a call on the payphone. jane.
sentences.chinese: 我想在公用电话亭打个电话。

sentences.english: Put a sofa beside a phone booth.
sentences.chinese: 公共电话亭旁放一个单人沙发。

sentences.english: I have to make a call on the payphone.
sentences.chinese: 我想在公用电话亭打个电话。

sentences.english: Jack brings Penticoff to the phone booth on San Fernando Road.
sentences.chinese: 杰克将彭蒂科夫带到圣费尔南多路的电话亭旁边。

sentences.english: Vandal have pull the telephone out of the call boxes.
sentences.chinese: 破坏公共财产者将电话机扯到电话亭外。

sentences.english: We had phone booths, remember them?
sentences.chinese: 我们那时候用电话亭，记得么？

sentences.english: Don't Ignore a ringing telephone. Caller may be in a call-box.
sentences.chinese: 不能置铃声不顾，来电者可能在公用电话亭。

sentences.english: The phone box was vandalized by a gang of youths.
sentences.chinese: 那电话亭被一群少年故意破坏了。

definition: kiosk/snack counter/retail department or section inside a larger business
